title: Tromb T1 Pearl Watch Face
summary: Elegant Watchface made of aluminum and pearl.
description: THIS IS THE FREE EDITION OF TROMB T1 GOLD - PREMIUM FEATURES ARE AVAILABLE IN THIS WATCHFACE UNTIL YOU GO IN AMBIENT MODE FOR 5 TIMES, THEN YOU WILL RETURN TO FREE FEATURESBeautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.-Square smartwatch redesign.-Neat design.-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.*PREMIUM-Constant upgrades adding new features.-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate). *PREMIUM-Day and Date dials.-Battery dial.UPCOMING:-Customizable Dials.-Presets.-Interactive watchface (chronometer).Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
descriptionHTML:
THIS IS THE FREE EDITION OF TROMB T1 GOLD - PREMIUM FEATURES ARE AVAILABLE IN THIS WATCHFACE UNTIL YOU GO IN AMBIENT MODE FOR 5 TIMES, THEN YOU WILL RETURN TO FREE FEATURES

Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.

It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.

-Square smartwatch redesign.

-Neat design.
-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.*PREMIUM
-Constant upgrades adding new features.
-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate). *PREMIUM

-Day and Date dials.
-Battery dial.

UPCOMING:
-Customizable Dials.
-Presets.
-Interactive watchface (chronometer).

Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
